{{Wireless embedded system |brand=eero |model=Pro |revision=(B010001) (2nd Gen) |series=AC2200 |asin=B071HHK2PN |est_release_date=06/27/2017 |fcc_date=05/25/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=2AEM4-B010001 |ic_id=20613-1117160 |pcb_id=175-00101 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=2.67 |pwr_conn=USB (Type C) |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=700 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Kingston |fla1_model=EMMC04G-M627 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85736-11;;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module (FEM);Qorvo (RFMD);QPF4518;;2; ,,, Mighty Gecko Mesh Networking Wireless SoC for ZigBee and Thread;Silicon Labs;EFR32MG;EFR32, MG1B232GG, 1706C00BM30;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.2 LE, MU-MIMO, ZigBee, Thread 1.1, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• 2x '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• 1x '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|eero (Second Generation)}} :{{ProductPage|https://eero.com/technology}} "175-00101 R5" is etched on the board in the FCC photos. *[https://blog.eero.com/the-second-generation-of-eero/ Second generation announcement on '''eero'''] :Very similar to the [[TP-LINK Deco M6 v1.0]] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33125-wi-fi-system-roundup?showall=&start=1 ''Wi-Fi System Roundup'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===See also=== *[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[eero A010001]] *[[eero B010001]] *[[eero D010001]] {{lowercase title}} __NOTOC__
